channel.title: Pi base pelase help maby simple!
channel.description:
Hello everyone i moved back to PI base coding having one problem with insidiax source thing!
Okay basically when normal player is getting killed on pk zone like edgeville, duel arena , funpk It respawns player in thzaar cave i have changed coords in config.java already but it dont work?
Can i have help please with this thing because it need to be fixed. Also i have problem wit duel arena it dotn respawn player after kill sometimes.

item.title: Pi base pelase help maby simple!
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:432777”][quote author=David321 link=topic=535488.msg3914816#msg3914816 date=1329069414]
Hello everyone i moved back to PI base coding having one problem with insidiax source thing!

Okay basically when normal player is getting killed on pk zone like edgeville, duel arena , funpk
It respawns player in thzaar cave i have changed coords in config.java already but it dont work?

Can i have help please with this thing because it need to be fixed.
Also i have problem wit duel arena it dotn respawn player after kill sometimes.
[/quote]
How much threads have you made over the last week?

You have compiled after you changed coords. And not everything is in config.java. Look at your minigame folders and search for the coords in there and change them. Or in client.java or any other file. It’s easy as that.

For the duel arena u have to add it that when you win you will teleport out. It’s not added yet.[/quote]

what can i do if i need help lol?

Read full topic
item.source: Pi base pelase help maby simple!

item.title: Pi base pelase help maby simple!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:1, topic:432777”]Hello everyone i moved back to PI base coding having one problem with insidiax source thing!

Okay basically when normal player is getting killed on pk zone like edgeville, duel arena , funpk
It respawns player in thzaar cave i have changed coords in config.java already but it dont work?

Can i have help please with this thing because it need to be fixed.
Also i have problem wit duel arena it dotn respawn player after kill sometimes.[/quote]
How much threads have you made over the last week?

You have compiled after you changed coords. And not everything is in config.java. Look at your minigame folders and search for the coords in there and change them. Or in client.java or any other file. It’s easy as that.

For the duel arena u have to add it that when you win you will teleport out. It’s not added yet.

Read full topic
